Articles.Content:
I have some suggestions for two or more ion engines. I think that there are original, but i can't be sure.

Because i don't knwo how to do any of these things, im asking help, nothing will make more happy that the last idea on a space ship.

-Ion trhuster: A 3.75 meter non-reusablke ion engine that has a very high trhust for is kind of engine (20 kn maybe?) and a very high energy comsumption rate. Once engaged, it will use all the fuel until run out of and it can be shutdowned (If you do before run out of fuel, you can't be able of engage the engine again. Something like a solid fuel engine on an ion version.

-Ion cluster. A 3.75 meter engine that will be a cluster of normal ion engines (like a chandelier but with ion engines instead of lights).

-GN Technology. Anyone has shown the anime series "Gundam 00"? If you saw it, you know what is a Gn Drive and a GN DRive Tau. the GN Drive will be the lastest device researched adn will be very expensive.

The GN Drive Tau will be earlier on the tech trree because it needs very bigs quantities of energy to generate GN Particles.

The earliest device on tech tree will be the GN condenser, a tank of GN Particles that will be depleted if you don't connect it to a GN Drive or a GN Drive Tau.

Here's more information about GN Drives.

http://gundam.wikia.com/wiki/GN_Drive

http://gundam.wikia.com/wiki/GN_Drive_Tau

http://gundam.wikia.com/wiki/GN_Condenser

Near Future propulsion has a 2.5m cluster of 12 ion engines

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/52042
